name: aerock
subtitle: An aerodynamics Houdini experiment
description:
aerock - a wind tunnel experiment that came from a post-it idea I wrote half-drunk at 2 AM.
Originally planned to finish in one (1) weekend. Didn't pan out at all, but I learned a ton about Houdini, all kinds of smoke simulation (definitely check out Axiom!) and well, that 24 gigs of RAM is not enough for hungry, hungry Houdini.
Huge shout-out to @therealentagma, @render.everything and the whole Houdini community, y'all rock!
